Mama's was the first place I saw multiple people on their computers in a cafe, just working.  We had the all-day breakfast for lunch out on the back patio, which was very enjoyable.The food was fairly simple American.  My friend had the pancakes and thought they were good.  I got the beef and scrambled eggs, which was hearty and delicious.Their hours are also fantastic for Barcelona, open 10am-11pm on Sunday.
